If you want to, you can now to tell us what you like about the Advent calendar, or what you don't like so much. We appreciate all your comments!
YOUR NAME
If you send us your email address, we'll respond to your message (optional).

YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS
Thanks for your comments!
WOW! GREAT JOB CHUBBY! EL PIX HAS BEEN KNOCKED OUT AND THE GAME FILES ARE SECURED.
YOU ARE THE BRAVEST LITTLE SNOWMAN IN THE VIDEO GAME WORLD! UPIXO FOUND THEIR NEW HERO!
MANY THANKS FOR PLAYING! MERRY CHRISTMAS AND HAPPY NEW YEAR TO ALL THE PEOPLE WHO JOINED CHUBBY ON HIS MISSION IN SNOWDRIFTLAND!
IDEA, CONCEPT, REALIZATION:

DEVELOPMENT, LEVEL DESIGN:
STEVE WELZ

GRAPHICS, DESIGN, ANIMATION:
BOGAC SARIAYDIN

PROJECT MANAGEMENT, COPY:
CHRISTIANE FRITSCH

MUSIC AND SOUND EFFECTS:
FABIAN DEL PRIORE (DYNAMEDION)
MISSION IN SNOWDRIFTLAND WAS BROUGHT TO YOU BY
SPECIAL THANKS GO TO:

CHRISTINE RICHTER (NINTENDO)
FOR THE SENSATIONAL COLLABORATION

CARSTEN URBANSKI (PING247)
FOR LOAD BALANCING AND SERVERS

JAKKAS
GUEST CONCEPT ARTIST FOR THE CAVE SCORPION
"SPECIALNE POZDROWIONKA DLA UCZNIÓW Z WAGROWIECKIEJ TRÓJKI"

GINA
FOR CORRECTING OUR POOR ENGLISH TRANSLATIONS

BEYCE
FOR EXTENSIVE BETA TESTING AND AS GUEST CONCEPT ARTIST FOR THE "BEYCNAKE"

MARGIT
FOR HER GREAT CAKES

CARSTEN
FOR THE FIVE STAR MEALS HE SERVED THE HARD WORKING EXTRA TOXIC TEAM

STEVE'S GRANNY
FOR HER EXTREMELY YUMMY COOKIES

CHRISTIAN
FOR THE HELPFUL TIPS CONCERNING LEVEL DESIGN

HYVER AND EVA
FOR THEIR HELP WITH A LITTLE DUTCH AND FRENCH TRANSLATION

ALL THE FANS
THAT SENT US SUCH GREAT FEEDBACK AND EXTENSIVE BUG REPORTS
<font color="#666666">AND WHAT ARE THE UPIXO HEROES DOING AFTER THIS ADVENTURE?</font>
EL PIX GOT A GRAPHICS PATCH, WHICH CORRECTED THE PIXEL BUGS IN HIS HEAD. HE AND CHUBBY ARE NOW THE MOST REQUESTED VIDEO GAME HEROES AT UPIXO.
PROFESSOR SCHWABBEL AND THE PENGUIN MOTHER ARE ENGAGED AND ARE PLANNING THEIR WEDDING.
THE CAVE UR-PENGUINS WERE OFFERED A WELL-PAID JOB AT THE PIXEL CIRCUS.
SPECIAL BONUS DOWNLOAD!
WATCH AGAIN
